name: Shark Finding Oysters
description:
You are a shark and one day, you decide you wanna be the best oyster collector in the world! Oysters (at least in this world) are found in corals, but they're pretty elusive. Only one seems to appear at a time and every time you pick one up, another appears in another coral!

Move with WASD or arrow keys.
Speed up with the B-button, enter, or X key.

A small fun game, to waste a couple of seconds of your time. Hope you have fun ^_^
